Step 1.Planning: Pick up the pipe from the countertop

Step 2.Planning: Remove the stain from the pipe

Step 3.Planning: Wash the pipe with water in the sink

Step 4.Planning: Apply liquid soap to the pipe

Step 5.Planning: Clean the pipe with the hand towel

Step 6.Planning: Put the pipe back on the countertop

Step 7.Planning: Dispose of the used hand towel
